sn51.6:1.1: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va samattam iddhim abhinipphadesum, sabbe te catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn51.6:1.2: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va samattam iddhim abhinipphadessanti, sabbe te catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn51.6:1.3: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samana va brahmana va samattam iddhim abhinipphadenti, sabbe te catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn51.6:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.6:2.6: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va samattam iddhim abhinipphadesum, sabbe te imesamyeva catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn51.6:2.7: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va samattam iddhim abhinipphadessanti, sabbe te imesamyeva catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn51.6:2.8: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samana va brahmana va samattam iddhim abhinipphadenti, sabbe te imesamyeva catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta”ti.
